platen-itch-embed.title: Itch Embed
platen-itch-embed.description: Add an embedded widget to a project on itch.io

fields.name: title
fields.title: Title: Specify the title of the project for accessibility purposes

fields.name: id
fields.title: ID: Specify the ID for the project's embeddable iframe

fields.name: preset
fields.title: Preset: Specify the dot-path to a preset embed definition relative to the 'data/platen/embeds/itch' folder in your repo

fields.name: dark
fields.title: Should display in dark mode instead of default

fields.name: square
fields.title: Should display as a square instead of a rectangle

fields.name: linkback
fields.title: Should cover image be a clickable link to the project

fields.name: background_color
fields.title: Background Color: Specify a hex color value.

fields.name: text_color
fields.title: Text Color: Specify a hex color value.

fields.name: button_color
fields.title: Button Color: Specify a hex color value.

fields.name: border_color
fields.title: Border Color: Specify a hex color value.

fields.name: border_width
fields.title: Border Width: Specify the width of the iframe's border in pixels.
